test_sets.set_display_name: The Case of the Golden Idol

test_cases.name: case1
test_cases.description: The first level from The Case of the Golden Idol video game, transcribed into text. Covers very basic deduction with multiple clues pointing to correct solutions, direct pattern matching, and no red herrings.
evaluation_matches: The men's camp is at the Horn of Thumb
The brown haired man's full name is Albert Cloudsley
The black haired man's full name is Oberon Geller
Albert Cloudsley pushed Oberon Geller from a cliff in the Horn of Thumb on Monkey Paw Island

test_cases.name: case2
test_cases.description: The second level from The Case of the Golden Idol video game, transcribed into text. Covers basic deduction with clues pointing to correct solutions, mixed direct and indirect pattern matching, and one red herring.

test_cases.name: problem1
test_cases.description: Question aimed to require multi-step logic (one hop) to solve, without explicit CoT.
